se.hig.exte.restcontroller

Class CourseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.hig.exte.restcontroller.CourseController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/courses")
public class CourseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController class responsible for mapping HTTP requests for the /courses path. It contains mappings of end-points to CrudServices that operate on Course records in the database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      CourseController(CourseService courseService, UnpublishService unpublishService, CookieHandler cookieHandler)
      Creates a CourseController object.

      • CourseController

        @Autowired
public CourseController(CourseService courseService,
                                    UnpublishService unpublishService,
                                    CookieHandler cookieHandler)
        Creates a CourseController object.
        Parameters:
        courseService - A CrudService class used to perform services exposed in this RestController.
        unpublishService - A CrudService class used to perform services exposed in this RestController.
        cookieHandler - object responsible for handling authentication.

      • saveCourse

        @PostMapping(value="/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Course> saveCourse(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                           @Valid Course course,
                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Creates a Course and stores it in the database.
        Parameters:
        course - The Course to add in the form of a JSON-object in the POST request.
        request - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the saved Course and an HTTP status code.

      • getCourseById

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Course> getCourseById(@PathVariable
                                                                                                 int id)
        Fetches the Course object with the given ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Course to fetch.
        Returns:
        The Course with the given ID.

      • getAllCourses

        @GetMapping(value="/all")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Course>> getAllCourses()
        Fetches all the published Course records from the database and returns them as a ResponseEntity object. List of Course objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the fetched Course objects.

      • getUnpublishedCoursesBySubjectId

        @GetMapping(value="/subject/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Course>> getUnpublishedCoursesBySubjectId(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                            int id)
        Fetches all Course objects belonging to the specified Subject ID. List of Course objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Subject to which the Courses belongs.
        Returns:
        A @ResponseEntity object containing a List of Course objects.

      • getPublishedCourseBySubjectId

        @GetMapping(value="/published/subject/{id}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Course>> getPublishedCourseBySubjectId(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                   int id)
        Fetches all Course objects belonging to the specified Subject ID. List of Course objects is automatically converted to JSON using Spring Boot's HttpMessageConverter and put in the ResponseEntity's body.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Subject to which the Courses belongs.
        Returns:
        A @ResponseEntity object containing a List of Course objects.

      • updateCourse

        @PatchMapping(value="/")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Course> updateCourse(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                              @Valid Course course,
                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Updates the Course object with the given ID in the database.
        Parameters:
        course - The Course to update in the form of a JSON-object in the POST request.
        request - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        A ResponseEntity object containing the updated Course and an HTTP status code.

      • search

        @GetMapping(value="/search/{text}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Course>> search(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String text,
                                                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Searches the database after courses with the text variable
        Parameters:
        text - The text searched.
        request - The incoming HTTP request.
        Returns:
        If super-user: A list of all courses that are a match and the http status OK. If not super-user in: A list of all published courses that are a match and the http status OK.

      • getUnpublishedCourses

        @GetMapping(value="/unpublished")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Course>> getUnpublishedCourses()
        Fetches all unpublished courses.
        Returns:
        A list of all unpublished courses and the http status OK.

        Parameters:

      • autoUnpublish

        @Scheduled(cron="0 2 3 * * *")
 @GetMapping(value="/testAuto")
public void autoUnpublish()
        This method is run automatically by Spring Boot at 03:00 every day.
